column1: '''''halla''''' is an adjective meaning "tall" in [[Quenya]].<ref name="footnote">{{App
column2: Letters}}, Note, ''The names of the letters'', Footnote 1</ref>

left]]''Halla'' is also the name in Quenya of a letter that was originally used to represent "breath" '''H'''.  It might be placed before a consonant to indicated that it was unvoiced and breathed, such as expressing voiceless ''l'' or ''r''.<ref name="footnote"/>  Over time though the letter ''[[Harma]]'', when used at the beginning of a word, came to represent "breath" ''h'' (and is then called ''[[Aha]]'').
